Khloe Kardashian

VN:F [1.9.22_1171]
please wait...
Rating: 7.7/10 (20 votes cast)

Khloe Kardashian is the third born and youngest of the three Kardashian sisters. She is a founder of DASH Boutique with her sisters Kim Kardashian and Khloe Kardashian. Khloe is currently married to NBA Basketball player Lamar Odom.

Khloe At Her Book Signing In 2011

Khloe Kardashian has been on many major media outlets and continues to be a central character in the Kardashian Klan and hit reality-TV series “Keeping Up With The Kardashians“, as well as spinoffs such as “Kourtney and Khloe take Miami”.

Khloe Kardashian and PETA

In 2010 Khloe Kardashian was selected as a public figure by the organization PETA to protest animal abuses in the fashion industry. Khloe seemed to be a perfect fit for this agenda, as she is a heavily exposed person, is in the fashion industry with DASH, and shares the feelings that animals should not be meant to suffer unnecessarily for the sake of luxury. In perhaps her most risque public appearance she appeared nude, but covered for a PETA photo shoot and public awareness campaign. Khloe Kardashian is also known for her role as Spokeswoman for Quick Trim dietary supplement.

Khloe Kardashian Book

Recently (December 2011) Khloe Kardashian appeared close by DASH LA at the Calabasas Barnes & Noble for a family booksigning of the most recent Kardashian release entitled “Kardashian Konfidential“. Sister Kourtney of DASH was along for the photo shoot. Also in attendance were the younger sisters Kendall and Kylie.


Image courtesy of celebuzz.com

Khloe Kardashian Marriage

Khloe Kardashian and Lamar Odom from the NBA, were married on September 27, 2009. Following the event, maid of honor and sister Kim Kardashian Tweeted “Khloe & Lamar’s wedding was a night to remember!”. Despite only a short 3-month courtship – two years later, the couple remains intact. On her wedding day, Khloe Kardashian was dressed in a Vera Wang dress.

Khloe Kardashian, owner of DASH boutique stores with husband Lamar Odom.
